english_translation: Crying over darkness means just a drizzle of tears;
Where are the sun's rays if you don't come out of the cave?

kannada_original: ಕರಿ ಸುರಂಗದ ತುದಿಗೆ ಇದೆ ಸೊಗದ ಚೆಂಬೆಳಕು ;
english_transliteration: Kari suraṅgada tudige ide sogada cembelaku ;
english_translation: At the end of the dark tunnel, there is the beautiful bright light of pleasure;
Despair is not appropriate! – Dear Rama.
